imdb.plot outline: Hidden adventures just outside the world's greatest cities. Experience the world from a new perspective, on Aerial Adventure. Shot entirely with state of the art UHD drone technology, Aerial Adventure takes viewers on an exhilarating journey just outside the world's greatest cities. Episodes 1 - 5 follow adventure athlete Clair Marie, as she bikes, climbs, trail runs, and BASE jumps from Los Angeles to Mammoth Lakes, California.
imdb.title: Aerial Adventure
plot: Hidden adventures just outside the world's greatest cities. Experience the world from a new perspective, on _Aerial Adventure_ (qv). Shot entirely with state of the art UHD drone technology, _Aerial Adventure_ (qv) takes viewers on an exhilarating journey just outside the world's greatest cities. Episodes 1 - 5 follow adventure athlete Clair Marie, as she bikes, climbs, trail runs, and BASE jumps from Los Angeles to Mammoth Lakes, California.
